name: OCKHeaderView.Configuration
desc: A configuration object that determines what the header view shows.

items.name: var showsSeparator: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether to show a separator under the text in the view.

items.name: var showsDetailDisclosure: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether to show an image on the trailing end of the view.

items.name: var showsIconImage: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether to show an image on the leading side of the text in the view.
